name: Kanas Barbecue Ketchup
description: Smoky and tangy barbecue ketchup from Kanas, perfect for grilling, dipping, or adding a rich flavor to your favorite dishes.

name: Kanas Chili Garlic Sauce
description: A fiery and flavorful chili garlic sauce by Kanas, blending spicy chilies with pungent garlic. Ideal for adding a kick to noodles, stir-fries, or as a zesty dip.

name: Kanas Dates Imli Chutney
description: Sweet and tangy chutney from Kanas, made with rich dates and tart tamarind (imli). A perfect accompaniment for snacks like samosas, pakoras, or chaat.

name: Kanas Green Chilli Chutney
description: A vibrant and spicy green chilli chutney from Kanas, perfect for adding fresh heat to sandwiches, snacks, or Indian meals.

name: Kanas Ketchup Sachet
description: Convenient single-serving sachets of Kanas classic tomato ketchup. Perfect for on-the-go meals, picnics, or portion control. (Price per small pack)

name: Kanas Mayonnaise Classic
description: Creamy and smooth classic mayonnaise from Kanas. Versatile for sandwiches, salads, dips, or as a base for your own sauces.

name: Kanas Plain Paratha
description: Ready-to-cook plain parathas by Kanas. Soft, flaky, and perfect to enjoy with curries, chutneys, or on their own. (Pack of frozen parathas)

name: Kanas Sriracha Ketchup Pouch
description: A bold fusion of classic Kanas ketchup with the fiery kick of Sriracha, conveniently packaged in a pouch. Perfect for adding spicy-sweet flavor.

name: Kanas Sweet Chilli Sauce
description: A delightful blend of sweet and mildly spicy flavors in Kanas Sweet Chilli Sauce. Perfect as a dipping sauce for spring rolls, chicken, or appetizers.

name: Kanas Tomato Ketchup Jalapeno
description: Kanas classic tomato ketchup infused with the fiery zest of jalapenos. Adds a delicious spicy twist to your favorite snacks and meals.

name: Kanas Tomato Ketchup
description: The classic, rich, and tangy tomato ketchup from Kanas. Made with ripe tomatoes, perfect for burgers, fries, and all your favorite dishes.

name: Kanas Whole Wheat Paratha
description: Healthy and delicious ready-to-cook whole wheat parathas by Kanas. A nutritious option for a quick and satisfying meal. (Pack of frozen parathas)
